name: tvOS 16.1
available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An app may be able to modify protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by removing additional entitlements.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Parsing a maliciously crafted audio file may lead to disclosure of user information
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Anonymous working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved bounds checks.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted certificate may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A certificate validation issue existed in the handling of WKWebView. This issue was addressed with improved validation.

cves.credit: Jonathan Zhang of Open Computing Facility (ocf.berkeley.edu)

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An app may be able to cause unexpected system termination or potentially execute code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Ian Beer of Google Project Zero

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A remote user may be able to cause kernel code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with improved locking.

cves.credit: Xinru Chi of Pangu Lab, John Aakerblom (@jaakerblom)

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An app with root privileges may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved bounds checks.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Ian Beer of Google Project Zero

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted USD file may disclose memory contents
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Xingwei Lin (@xwlin_roy) and Yinyi Wu of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: An access issue was addressed with additional sandbox restrictions.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Visiting a malicious website may lead to user interface spoofing
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved UI handling.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may disclose sensitive user information
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Abdulrahman Alqabandi of Microsoft Browser Vulnerability Research, Ryan Shin of IAAI SecLab at Korea University, Dohyun Lee (@l33d0hyun) of DNSLab at Korea University

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may disclose internal states of the app
advisories.description: A correctness issue in the JIT was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Wonyoung Jung (@nonetype_pwn) of KAIST Hacking Lab
